alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 9:31AM MST until December 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...In Wyoming, the Weston County Plains. In South Dakota, the Fall River County Plains, Jackson County, Oglala Lakota County and the Southern Foot Hills. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Southern Foot Hills
